title: heavy black solid fonts of Varoom
content:
I need to find a selection of heavy/black/solid typefaces that can create a similar look to the headlines in varoom. But I don’t want the counters to be filled in.

[www.varoom-mag.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20071017181548/http:/www.varoom-mag.com/ "www.varoom-mag.com")

Any help gratefully recieved

 [‹ Nubian by Willard Sniffin](http://web.archive.org/web/20071017181548/http:/typophile.com/node/37571 "Go to previous forum topic") ['Progress means simplifying, not complicating' Bruno Munari ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071017181548/http:/typophile.com/node/36878 "Go to next forum topic")
author: display

comments.content:
I’ll just go ahead and post this again:

**Heavy Geometric Retro Deco ’80s Sans**  
 [Black Boton Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20071017181548/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/creative_alliance/black_boton_bold/)  
 [Frank](http://web.archive.org/web/20071017181548/http:/www.neutura.org/Frank.html)  
 [Deuce](http://web.archive.org/web/20071017181548/http:/www.neutura.org/Deuce.html)  
 [Mostra Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20071017181548/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/mark_simonson/mostra_blk_one_two_three/)  
 [Blocks](http://web.archive.org/web/20071017181548/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/creative_alliance/blocks/?sample_text=TOTALLY%20NU%20RAVE&sample_size=36)  
 [Alpha Bloc Sculpture](http://web.archive.org/web/20071017181548/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/font_bureau/alpha_bloc_sculpture/)  
 [FF Extra](http://web.archive.org/web/20071017181548/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff_extra/)  
 [Unovis](http://web.archive.org/web/20071017181548/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/paratype/unovis_regular_ot/)  
 [Neutrino](http://web.archive.org/web/20071017181548/http:/www.neutura.org/Neutrino.html)  
 [Toch](http://web.archive.org/web/20071017181548/http:/lamosca.com/)  
 [NB Block](http://web.archive.org/web/20071017181548/http:/www.neubauladen.com/catalogue/NB-Typografie/3/NBBlock%E2%84%A2/1310/1)  
 [Acton](http://web.archive.org/web/20071017181548/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/device_fonts/acton/)  
 [Bebit](http://web.archive.org/web/20071017181548/http:/www.paratype.com/pstore/default.asp?fcode=TM_BBT&letter=B) (Cyrillic version of Milton Glaser’s Baby Teeth)  
 [Parkitecture](http://web.archive.org/web/20071017181548/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/jnlevine/parkitecture/regular/?refby=typographica)  
 [Wagner Silhouette](http://web.archive.org/web/20071017181548/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/wagner-silhouette-nf/)  
 [Rody](http://web.archive.org/web/20071017181548/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/discourse/rody/?refby=typographica) and [Lazar](http://web.archive.org/web/20071017181548/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/discourse/lazar/?refby=typographica)  
 [Milford](http://web.archive.org/web/20071017181548/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sparkytype/milford/?refby=typographica)  
 [Cooter](http://web.archive.org/web/20071017181548/http:/www.typetrust.com/fonts/font.php?id=NzA=)  
 [Douff](http://web.archive.org/web/20071017181548/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/2rebels/doufff/)

Free  
 [Spokes](http://web.archive.org/web/20071017181548/http:/down10.com/fonts/spokes.html)  
 [Disco Deck](http://web.archive.org/web/20071017181548/http:/www.dafont.com/font.php?file=disco_deck)  
 [Pacmania Normal](http://web.archive.org/web/20071017181548/http:/www.abstractfonts.com/font/1580)  
 [Fatti Patti](http://web.archive.org/web/20071017181548/http:/www.moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/casady_greene/d_h.htm) (lame version of Baby Teeth)  
 [Lovers Square](http://web.archive.org/web/20071017181548/http:/www.happyloverstown.eu/wordpress/)  
 [Pimp](http://web.archive.org/web/20071017181548/http:/www.formlos.net/formlosTF/Pimp)

Custom  
 [Non-Format](http://web.archive.org/web/20071017181548/http:/www.non-format.com/) created a bunch of these for their design work.

Soft and Round  
 [Deuce Round](http://web.archive.org/web/20071017181548/http:/www.neutura.org/DeuceRound.html)  
 [Copal](http://web.archive.org/web/20071017181548/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/monotype/copal_std_ot/)  
 [NB Rund](http://web.archive.org/web/20071017181548/http:/www.neubauladen.com/catalogue/NB-Typography/3/NBFett%E2%84%A2/1044/1)  
 [Umma Gommma](http://web.archive.org/web/20071017181548/http:/www.happyloverstown.eu/wordpress/)  
 [Gusto](http://web.archive.org/web/20071017181548/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/device_fonts/gusto/)  
 [Fatty](http://web.archive.org/web/20071017181548/http:/www.typetrust.com/fonts/font.php?id=MTIw)
